definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
China UnionPay (CUP), China's only domestic bank card organization

sentences.english: On July 16th BankUnited's share price more than doubled, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而在七月16日銀聯銀行的股價翻了兩番多。

sentences.english: Omar Ayash is President and CEO of Silverway International Trading Limited.
sentences.chinese: 歐馬先生現任銀聯國際貿易有限公司總裁，敘利亞籍。

sentences.english: Plus, complimentary Great Wall UnionPay Card Platinum, 2 years fee waiver.
sentences.chinese: 附屬長城銀聯白金卡，首兩年免費。

sentences.english: Since the establishment of China Unionpay, obtained enormous development in business.
sentences.chinese: 中國銀聯成立以來，業務取得巨大發展。

sentences.english: Payment must be settled by China Unionpay.
sentences.chinese: 必須以中國銀聯卡籤賬。
付款前請出示中國銀聯卡。

sentences.english: During that time, unioPay grew into a full-blown monopoly.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，銀聯成長爲一家羽翼豐滿的壟斷巨頭。

sentences.english: It will be very convenient to pay for such expenses as tuition fees with a UnionPay card.
sentences.chinese: 在繳納學費時，用銀聯卡刷卡繳費會比較方便。

sentences.english: Plus, complimentary Great Wall Card UnionPay Platinum, 2 years fee waiver.
sentences.chinese: 附屬長城銀聯白金卡，首兩年免年費。
